FrontEnd

Class PickPlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.StateLoad
      • FrontEnd.PickPlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class PickPlayerController
extends StateLoad
    After game setup, show numbers of choiceBox to let players select a player profile for different players, set these files to an ArrayList for gameBoard to use and run.

      • savePlayersAndStart

        public void savePlayersAndStart()
        Identifies the player chosen has the right number and style. Then uses readProfile to turn these files to profiles and send them to the gameboard profile class. Then run the gameboard class.

      • onBackButton

        public void onBackButton()
        This method if called returns to the previous window.
